title: HOUR 3- John Calipari Sep 10, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- John Calipari Sep 10, 2020
description:
Kentucky Head Basketball Coach John Calipari tells Dan that the NCAA will have a basketball season. Coach Cal says that all the schools have to survive together and that means that the big schools have to play and help the small schools so that they wont have to close down their programs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
